Breakup.title: Breakup Menu
Breakup.helpBody:
The Breakup Menu is a tool for simulating the breakup of a satellite.

By modifying duplicating and modifying a satellite's orbit we can model the breakup of a satellite. After selecting a satellite and opening the menu, the user can select:
  • Inclination Variation
  • RAAN Variation
  • Period Variation
  • Number of Breakup Pieces
The larger the variation the bigger the spread in the simulated breakup. The default variations are sufficient to simulate a breakup with a reasonable spread.

errorMsgs.CannotCreateBreakupForNonCircularOrbits: Cannot create a breakup for non-circular orbits. Working on a fix.
errorMsgs.CannotCalcDirectionOfSatellite: Cannot calculate direction of satellite. Try again later.
errorMsgs.InvalidStartNum: Invalid satellite starting number! Defaulting to 90000!
